
==Bin Reader==

Read a binary file and output its contents to the console.
The Bin Reader reads bin (Binary File) files. The default file extension is .bin.


{| class="PropertiesTable" border="1" cellpadding="5"
|-
| '''Property'''
| '''Description'''
| '''Default Value(s)'''
| '''Restrictions'''

|-
|'''FileName''' (FileName)
|

This property specifies the file name for the Bin reader.

|

|
The value(s) must be a filename (or filenames).

|}
